text: Hi there. I'm Tom. I'm the new graphic designer. Oh, hi, Tom. I'm Sophie. I'm a developer. Where are you from, Tom? I'm from Texas. How about you? I'm from here in California. Welcome aboard. Thanks. Everybody is so nice around here. Hey, is this one of those standing desks? These are great. It's good to stand up a little instead of just sitting all the time. That's so true. A standing desk, an ergonomic chair, and an ergonomic mouse. Man, everything is perfect. I'm in love with this place. So nice to have someone so energetic like you and the team. Are you ready to begin? Yes, I sure am.
